sub_title: Consultant for subsidy requests, available soon
summary:
In development cooperation:
Highly successful proposal writer ever since 1989 for projects and programs in Africa, Asia, Europe and Latin America.
Initiator of innovative programs at Wilde Ganzen Foundation like:
* Action for Children, a capacity strengthening programme on Local Fundraising in the Global South that strengthened the capacity of > 1,000 Civil Society Organisations. Co-funded by the Netherlands government
* Reframing the Message, a training, advocacy and debate programme on the frames donor organisations in the Global North use when promoting their work. Co-funded by the European Union;
* Change the Game Academy, a blended learning program on Domestic Resource Mobilisation and Lobby & Advocacy for CSOs in the Global South that strengthened the capacity of > 2,000 CSOs plus > 10,000 individuals. Co-funded by the Netherlands Government

As a historian:
Specialised in the history of the Congo Independent State, 1857-1908 (preparing a doctoral thesis on Dutch trade relations there).
